title: Built Rite Creations marketing site (precisionlasernw.com content recreation)

requirements.summary: Recreate precisionlasernw.com public marketing pages/sections and written content with all company-name references changed to “Built Rite Creations”.
acceptanceCriteria: All user-visible pages/sections present on https://precisionlasernw.com are represented in the new app (including navigation and footer links).

All occurrences of the original company name on the recreated pages are replaced with "Built Rite Creations" (including headings, paragraphs, meta title/description, footer copyright, and any call-to-action text).
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a single source-of-truth content model that mirrors the page structure, section ordering, and written copy from precisionlasernw.com, with all company-name strings replaced by “Built Rite Creations”.

Create the top-level app composition that renders the recreated marketing site pages/sections using the content from frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts and ensures all visible branding reads “Built Rite Creations”.
Create a shared marketing layout with a consistent header and footer; include navigation and footer links that reflect the same set of pages/sections available on precisionlasernw.com.

Implement the public header/navigation UI (including mobile navigation) matching the link set and hierarchy from precisionlasernw.com; use shadcn-ui components to support accessible navigation patterns (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
Implement the public footer UI with the same footer link structure as precisionlasernw.com; ensure copyright and any CTA/company references use “Built Rite Creations”.
Create the Home page that reproduces the same sections and copy order as the precisionlasernw.com home content using frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts.
Create the Services (or equivalent) page to match precisionlasernw.com services-related sections and text using frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts.
Create the Gallery/Portfolio (or equivalent) page structure to match precisionlasernw.com (text and section structure only; no new image requirements) using frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts.
Create the About (or equivalent) page to match precisionlasernw.com about/company sections and written content using frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts.
Create the Contact (or equivalent) page to match precisionlasernw.com contact sections and text using frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts; ensure all copy references “Built Rite Creations”.

Create a reusable section renderer to map the precisionlasernw.com-aligned content model into consistent section layouts across pages; use shadcn-ui components (e.g., card/button/accordion as appropriate) to standardize section presentation (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

Create a reusable CTA section component to render any CTAs present in the source site copy, ensuring all labels and text reference “Built Rite Creations”; use shadcn-ui button styling for consistent CTAs (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
Wire the newly created frontend/src/App.tsx into the existing React entry so the recreated marketing site renders as the primary application UI.

requirements.summary: Deliver a responsive, accessible UI with working navigation and sensible SEO defaults (per-page titles + global meta description).
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation elements route correctly to their corresponding pages/sections without broken links.
Layout remains readable and usable on mobile and desktop screen sizes.
Each route/page has a non-empty document title and the app includes a meta description.

file_operations.description: Add a global meta description suitable for the “Built Rite Creations” marketing site and ensure the base HTML remains configured for accessibility (lang already set to en).
Create the client-side routing configuration for all recreated pages/sections from precisionlasernw.com and ensure no broken links from header/footer navigation.
Integrate the router and ensure the layout/header/footer are consistently applied to all public routes.
Add a small hook that sets a non-empty document title per route/page and supports a consistent title format for “Built Rite Creations”.
Apply per-page document title behavior and ensure semantic structure (landmarks/headings) and responsive layout decisions for mobile/tablet/desktop.
Apply per-page document title behavior and ensure semantic structure and responsive layout decisions for mobile/tablet/desktop.
Apply per-page document title behavior and ensure semantic structure and responsive layout decisions for mobile/tablet/desktop.
Apply per-page document title behavior and ensure semantic structure and responsive layout decisions for mobile/tablet/desktop.

Apply per-page document title behavior and ensure semantic structure and responsive layout decisions for mobile/tablet/desktop (including accessible form/contact presentation if present on the source site).

Ensure the navigation is keyboard accessible, provides clear focus states, and supports a responsive mobile menu; use shadcn-ui primitives as needed for accessible interactions (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
Create global styles that ensure readable typography, accessible focus indicators, and responsive defaults (e.g., base line-height and spacing) for the marketing site.

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive industrial/craft visual theme for “Built Rite Creations” across header, footer, and all sections (not default template styling).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across header, footer, and all sections (typography scale, button styles, and spacing feel unified).
Color palette and typography clearly communicate an industrial/craft brand aesthetic (not a generic default template look).

file_operations.description: Adjust Tailwind theme tokens (colors/typography/spacing extensions) to establish an industrial/craft palette and consistent UI rhythm used throughout the site.
Define global CSS variables and baseline typography to support the chosen “Built Rite Creations” industrial theme and ensure consistent styling across components and sections.
Apply consistent layout spacing, section padding, max-width/container rules, and background treatments so the entire site shares a unified visual system.

Standardize section styling (headings, subheadings, body copy, dividers, and cards) to avoid default-looking template styling; use shadcn-ui components where appropriate for cohesive UI elements (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

Ensure primary/secondary CTA styling is consistent across the site and matches the industrial/craft theme; use shadcn-ui button variants if available (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
Align header visual design (logo/wordmark treatment, nav item styling, and responsive menu presentation) with the industrial/craft theme (not default styling).
Align footer typography, link styling, and background/foreground contrast with the industrial/craft theme and ensure consistency with the header and sections.
